subject: Fwd:
body:
She set the tray of food down on the bureau, then 
rolled the wheelchair over to the bed.He remembered where her bookmark had 
been last night, three-quarters of the way through.Last of all he looked 
across at the typewriter and the vast, untidy pile of manuscript.He had 
pills, and they would take away the pain, but they would also blur his 
thoughts.
